verses.verse: Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> ye the word <WH1697> which the YY <WH3068> speaketh <WH1696> <WH8765> unto you, O house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>:

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, Learn <WH3925> <WH8799> not the way <WH1870> of the heathen <WH1471>, and be not dismayed <WH2865> <WH8735> at the signs <WH226> of heaven <WH8064>; for the heathen <WH1471> are dismayed <WH2865> <WH8735> at them <WH1992>.

For the customs <WH2708> of the people <WH5971> are vain <WH1892>: for one cutteth <WH3772> <WH8804> a tree <WH6086> out of the forest <WH3293>, the work <WH4639> of the hands <WH3027> of the workman <WH2796>, with the axe <WH4621>.
They deck <WH3302> <WH8762> it with silver <WH3701> and with gold <WH2091>; they fasten <WH2388> <WH8762> it with nails <WH4548> and with hammers <WH4717>, that it move <WH6328> <WH8686> not.

They are upright <WH4749> as the palm tree <WH8560>, but speak <WH1696> <WH8762> not: they must needs <WH5375> <WH8800> be borne <WH5375> <WH8735>, because they cannot go <WH6805> <WH8799>. Be not afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of them; for they cannot do evil <WH7489> <WH8686>, neither also is it in them to do good <WH3190> <WH8687>.
Forasmuch as there is none like unto thee, O YY <WH3068>; thou art great <WH1419>, and thy name <WH8034> is great <WH1419> in might <WH1369>.

Who would not fear <WH3372> <WH8799> thee, O King <WH4428> of nations <WH1471>? for to thee doth it appertain <WH2969> <WH8804>: forasmuch as among all the wise <WH2450> men of the nations <WH1471>, and in all their kingdoms <WH4438>, there is none like unto thee.
But they are altogether <WH259> brutish <WH1197> <WH8799> and foolish <WH3688> <WH8799>: the stock <WH6086> is a doctrine <WH4148> of vanities <WH1892>.

Silver <WH3701> spread into plates <WH7554> <WH8794> is brought <WH935> <WH8714> from Tarshish <WH8659>, and gold <WH2091> from Uphaz <WH210>, the work <WH4639> of the workman <WH2796>, and of the hands <WH3027> of the founder <WH6884> <WH8802>: blue <WH8504> and purple <WH713> is their clothing <WH3830>: they are all the work <WH4639> of cunning <WH2450> men.

But the YY <WH3068> is the true <WH571> 'Elohim <WH430>, he is the living <WH2416> 'Elohim <WH430>, and an everlasting <WH5769> king <WH4428>: at his wrath <WH7110> the earth <WH776> shall tremble <WH7493> <WH8799>, and the nations <WH1471> shall not be able to abide <WH3557> <WH8686> his indignation <WH2195>.

Thus <WH1836> shall ye say <WH560> <WH8748> unto them, The 'elohim <WH426> that have not <WH3809> made <WH5648> <WH8754> the heavens <WH8065> and the earth <WH778>, even they shall perish <WH7> <WH8748> from the earth <WH772>, and from under <WH8460> these <WH429> heavens <WH8065>.

He hath made <WH6213> <WH8802> the earth <WH776> by his power <WH3581>, he hath established <WH3559> <WH8688> the world <WH8398> by his wisdom <WH2451>, and hath stretched out <WH5186> <WH8804> the heavens <WH8064> by his discretion <WH8394>.

When he uttereth <WH5414> <WH8800> his voice <WH6963>, there is a multitude <WH1995> of waters <WH4325> in the heavens <WH8064>, and he causeht the vapours <WH5387> to ascend <WH5927> <WH8686> from the ends <WH7097> of the earth <WH776>; he maketh <WH6213> <WH8804> lightnings <WH1300> with rain <WH4306>, and bringeth forth <WH3318> <WH8686> the wind <WH7307> out of his treasures <WH214>.

Havahry man <WH120> is brutish <WH1197> <WH8738> in his knowledge <WH1847>: every founder <WH6884> <WH8802> is confounded <WH3001> <WH8689> by the graven image <WH6459>: for his molten image <WH5262> is falsehood <WH8267>, and there is no breath <WH7307> in them.
They are vanity <WH1892>, and the work <WH4639> of errors <WH8595>: in the time <WH6256> of their visitation <WH6486> they shall perish <WH6> <WH8799>.

The portion <WH2506> of Ya`akov <WH3290> is not like them: for he is the former <WH3335> <WH8802> of all things; and Yisra'EL <WH3478> is the rod <WH7626> of his inheritance <WH5159>: The YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> is his name <WH8034>.
Gater up <WH622> <WH8798> thy wares <WH3666> out of the land <WH776>, O inhabitant <WH3427> <WH8802> of the fortress <WH4692>.

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, Behold, I will sling <WH7049> <WH8802> out the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776> at this once <WH6471>, and will distress <WH6887> <WH8689> them, that they may find <WH4672> <WH8799> it so.
Woe <WH188> is me for my hurt <WH7667> ! my wound <WH4347> is grievous <WH2470> <WH8737>: but I said <WH559> <WH8804>, Truly <WH389> this is a grief <WH2483>, and I must bear <WH5375> <WH8799> it.

My tabernacle <WH168> is spoiled <WH7703> <WH8795>, and all my cords <WH4340> are broken <WH5423> <WH8738>: my children <WH1121> are gone forth <WH3318> <WH8804> of me, and they are not: there is none to stretch forth <WH5186> <WH8802> my tent <WH168> any more, and to set up <WH6965> <WH8688> my parokhets <WH3407>.

For the pastors <WH7462> <WH8802> are become brutish <WH1197> <WH8738>, and have not sought <WH1875> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>: therefore they shall not prosper <WH7919> <WH8689>, and all their flocks <WH4830> shall be scattered <WH6327> <WH8738>.

Behold, the noise <WH6963> of the bruit <WH8052> is come <WH935> <WH8802>, and a great <WH1419> commotion <WH7494> out of the north <WH6828> country <WH776>, to make <WH7760> <WH8800> the cities <WH5892> of Y'hudah <WH3063> desolate <WH8077>, and a den <WH4583> of dragons <WH8577>.
O YY <WH3068>, I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that the way <WH1870> of man <WH120> is not in himself: it is not in man <WH376> that walketh <WH1980> <WH8802> to direct <WH3559> <WH8687> his steps <WH6806>.
O YY <WH3068>, correct <WH3256> <WH8761> me, but with judgment <WH4941>; not in thine anger <WH639>, lest thou bring me to nothing <WH4591> <WH8686>.

Pour out <WH8210> <WH8798> thy fury <WH2534> upon the heathen <WH1471> that know <WH3045> <WH8804> thee not, and upon the families <WH4940> that call <WH7121> <WH8804> not on thy name <WH8034>: for they have eaten up <WH398> <WH8804> Ya`akov <WH3290>, and devoured <WH398> <WH8804> him, and consumed <WH3615> <WH8762> him, and have made his habitation <WH5116> desolate <WH8074> <WH8689>.
